title: However in case of non -availability / shortage of TDR, the Authority, after considering the local situation, may allow utilisation of entire potential with premium FSI
clause_text: However in case of non -availability / shortage of TDR, the Authority, after considering the local situation, may allow utilisation of entire potential with premium FSI. The Planning Authority shall compensate for the same to Metro Project Implementing Authority as per the sharing formula decided by the Government from time to time.
section: Impact Assessment and Integrated Mobility Plan

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
